Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: No real complaints Not really an English flair more like a good business hotel All the amenities were there however My wife says it was a typical businessman s hotel with no place for a woman to set down and put on make up Unfortunately most hotels have this problem Are there never any women involved in designing a hotel room A good value for our money overall
Positive_Review: The eggs were NOT fluffy Overall the hotel was bright clean and In a decent location with very pleasant staff A great lounge We were quite pleased overall

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The staff very rude Upon checking in unpleasant greeting Was not escorted to my room Came back to the hotel after a night out Staff engaged me and others into a rude line of questioning Had to look for my key to get into the hotel as doors were locked I would expect the door man of a five star hotel to recognise guests staying in the hotel As I was walking into the hotel on this night the door guy let the door hit me on my way in as he didn t hold the door open It seemed a bit racist to be honest I paid almost a thousand for two nights for such ill treatment Was not impressed by the room dinning Food was plain Worse food I ve eaten in a five star hotel One more thing Upon checking in staff rudely asked for my passport whilst I m actually a resident here I gave him a debit card to process the payment for the room and after he rudely asked if I could use a credit card instead And then he seemed disappointed when I said I only have debit cards I don t see the difference between a debit and credit card I think it s a racist hotel I m staying in jumeirah carlton next time And I do come to London a lot Your loss losers

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The AC was sometimes hot the room is small for three specially with the extra bed
Positive_Review: The cleanness and the fact that there is water haze in the bathroom The security of the hotel is also excellent

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: It took me long time to check in and I think even though the location and the service was very good but you could find more cost effective hotels around the area if you could plan much more in advance which was not in my case
Positive_Review: location of the hotel is excellent walking distance for Harrods and facing the Hyde park House keeping and Concierge staff were very helpful I appreciate them a lot

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Very comfortable rooms and beds Love the quality of breakfast Great location on Knightsbridge stone throw away to Hyde Park and shopping Harvey Nichols Harrods etc

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The shower box in my room was bizarre on a triangular shape The room 5th floor lacks a bit of modernization revamp carpet and sofa looks tired from usage
Positive_Review: The hotel features a beautiful lobby with lounge area and bar The location is absolutely fantastic just few steps away from hyde park sloane street knightsbridge station harrods The room size is ok

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The fact I wasn t able to collect my reward points as I booked through booking com so I won t do that again The reason I picked this hotel was the fact that I would earn reward points from SPG and the location

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Staff was not luxury hotel caliber Hyde bar staff was not high end caliber Rooms are outdated moldy smell fixtures falling apart and no nespresso machine for luxury

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: I did not have evening cleaning service called the manager on duty at 12 00 night when I came back from dinner and she told me that housekeeping was closed How can it be closed in a 5 hotel I was told that they will investigate I received no feedback and anyway this was not adequate When you pay so much money you expect service Also about the cleanness the room had lots of dust you could see on the furniture However I have to mention that the room was otherwise clean and housekeeping when working was very friendly To end there was not a no disrurb sign in the room
Positive_Review: Space in room room facilities like sockets and USB port and wonderful view of the city executive room

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: In my whole experience In this hotel the lobby staff where always rude and unrespectful at all especially with platinum members the treat you as if your such a dumb and doesn t understand a word which I ve tried the whole worlds most luxurious hotels no one have ever treated me that kind of way And thank you

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: I wasn t happy with reception at all because they didn t give me the room that I booked in Booking com and unfortunately in very rude way they said we don t have any other room u want or u don t want this is available I booked non smoking and this room was smoking area and so many different things

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The 1st reception lady was not polite when she was demanding 100BP night as deposit even though this was not mentioned in booking and she mentioned the part This is our policy and we need this in case you run away
Positive_Review: The room was quite Bed and pillows were very comfortable my room gets cleaned at least twice a day without asking which is excellent The hotel is just 1 minute walk from Harvey Nichols The underground is 2 minutes 250m walk from the hotel Hyde park is 2 minutes walk from the hotel

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: 1 internet is not free 2 furniture is old 3 they took a charge 30 pounds because I was late to make check out for few minutes

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfortable and meant a good nights sleep The bathroom was huge and very clean with a good range of toiletries We had a room on the top floor which gives an amazing view of the London skyline

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The porter took to much time to come to bring down my luggages Also in the UBER appplication the hotel location is not saved exactly PIN
Positive_Review: location to Harrods store as it is very close Khnightsbridge Station as well

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The reception staff must have a serious training in how to welcome the guests how to smile and let people feel that they re welcomed Straight face look is something not recommended at all from the reception people The Wifi is free only for 2 hours per day Wifi service is something basic everywhere nowadays Felt lots of dusts in the room even if they clean still there was dusts
Positive_Review: The Panoramic room view is good over the Hyde Park and you can see the London Eye plus the Shard from far away Great location Few steps from Harvey and the Harrods very close 5 minutes walking The concierge staffs were great and the ones who were on the main door to bring the taxis are fantastic even the staffs of the breakfast area Very good breakfast choices which give you the option of having a good English Breakfast every day Big THANKS to the breakfast area people and the concierge ones to be very helpful nice and smiling all the time

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Breakfast is extremely poor in terms of verify and value for money Poor sound proofing can hear everything in the next room
Positive_Review: Great location and very good staff

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: I forgot high value flash drive with personal information in the safe box Called same day I checked out its gone Clearly it was stolen That incident completely changed aftertaste from the stay

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The parking area in the basement is very expansive for 1 2 or 3 hours however they said it s not owned by the hotel but even still Paying guarantee 75 for each night I stayed for 2 night and they wanted me to pay 75 X 2 150 Not reasonable but after talking to them and negotiate it they let me pay 75 only Hotel like this you should not put a trainee on the reception during busy times When checking in or out they just makes life harder for the guests

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Wifi was available for free for 2 hours per day Although paid wifi was available hotels of this level should just offer complimentary wifi for their guests
Positive_Review: The location is outstanding and the hotel was clean and comfortable The room was ready when I checked in and check out was a breeze Staff were courteous and professional

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: I had a broken light switch that wasn t fixed during my stay rooms were a bit noisy as windows didn t block noise coming from the outside completely The hotel charges 10 gbp per 24hr for using the room wifi which I think should be for free
Positive_Review: Staff were very kind and helpful rooms were spacious location is perfect rooms were clean and bedsheets and cover were changed regularly

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Restaurant is good but overated dining at 8 30pm at night you would not expect to be disturbed by a baby crying Should be a curfew on Children in Restaurant
Positive_Review: Location is excellent for various London attractions

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Not a true refurbishment more like a facelift Booked nonsmoking was given smoking because Booking com doesn t guarantee nonsmoking

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Location of the room was very noisy because it is near the staff room and sometimes no complimentary water and coffee were provided
Positive_Review: Breakfast sand staff are very good

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: WIFI is not free I know countires having free wifi in the streets room sealing is horrible i was able to hear the guys in the next room streching elevator broken down and there were no notices or proper help from staff reception and other lines were always busy or no answer lobby was full of hookers not recommended for families the most horrible hotel in London price is so expensive

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The room was not clean at all There were moving bugs on the curtains The lights where not working It was extremely bad smell in the room After I complained they said because your booking is through Booking com there are only few number of rooms that are allocated to your category It s clear that the worst category is given for users booking through you

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Only 2 hours free wifi and then 10 pounds per day Breakfast not included in a not so cheap price so I do not have opinion on restaurants
Positive_Review: The only positive thing were the location and the friendly staff

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The elevators didn t always function well The curtain had a stain on it The shower was old fashioned The furniture in general was very old fashioned for such an expensive hotel in the heart of London
Positive_Review: Location is fantastic The receptionist a tall lady I don t know her name was fantastic and accommodating The gentleman carrying the bag he has white grey hair was also so friendly and offered great service I loved how the bathroom had a hose in it

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The check in process was not up to my expectation I had to wait 3 hours in the lobby to get the room I got it by 5 30 pm
Positive_Review: It was good experience in general

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: only 2 hrs of free wi fi in the room asked for the hyde park view and higher floor however didn t receive it
Positive_Review: Great concierge service pretty big rooms

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: They couldn t upgrade us because it was booked through booking so we didn t have that benifit when we could have and finally They couldn t accommodate us for 2 more nights

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Heating AC did not work even after repair it was freezing Cane home with a cold from cold air blowing Had interconnecting rooms next door was fine thermostat must be faulty No visible security especially since had a bag stolen from restaurant on a previous visit

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The bedsheets stinks Housekeeping Service was very poor starting from the Cleanliness of the room to the hygiene of bathroom s towels The receptionists have the worst attitude and When I ordered eggs for breakfast they said they ran out of salt pepper

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: bathroom is outdated and rusted bathroom tile yellow i did book the executive room but there was no garden view and my friend had free upgrade from standard room to executive for free and i still had to pay the difference which i thought not fare wifi is free in most uk except this place that is apsoloutly not convenient and its slow u got to pay tooooo much for olny the location no free wifi no cofee machine no much to expect receptienest was notfriendly
Positive_Review: location is just what i want

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: nothing all was good
Positive_Review: Location facilities staff comfort size of the room door staff all excellent Very happy with stay and would highly recommend

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Cleanliness of the room the mirror in the room was dusty Sometimes its noisy because of the cars The bar restaurant service was too slow when we ordered dinner and no bread came with before the main dishes when we asked they said it is payable and not complimentary
Positive_Review: The location Luis at the reception was very nice and helpful Room size

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: no coffee machine and the fact that I can hear my neighboors
Positive_Review: location was excellent and when I couldn t send my cloths to laundry they offered to come to my room and iron my dress for free

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Room was not clean enough and bath towels replacement was poor as well as shower tab was heavly leaking without notice Spot light in front of the room was making high noise and seem a big problem

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: At chic out we inform staff we need late check out at 1400 but one lady call us and sharplly inform us that if we did not leave at 1200 they going to use our credit car for Charjan another night
Positive_Review: The staff was good while chickin And we get two room late one at 1500 and the second at 1700

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Flickering lights all over the room dimmer problem and not fixed Bathroom light very dim Room was very very dusty the coach and under the window with old medicine alaminium papers Toiletries were not in bathroom abone arrival 1218 room very noisy infront of the servies door couldent sleep well in the mourning

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Gym facility is small The price is considered high compared to other hotels but not over priced
Positive_Review: Best Hotel in London from my view as almost all rooms are very spacious compare to other hotels Bathrooms have water hose for toilet which many middle eastern people struggle to have when traveling to Europe

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The noise came from outside through the windows
Positive_Review: It was fantastic unless the noise at night came from street it would be much better if the widows was double glaze

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Sunday morning breakfast was chaos Hot buffet in a cramped space and very slow to be replenished Cold buffet uninviting because unsupervised children and some adults picking over the food with hands Poor value for money

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Over perfume room trying to hide bad odours coming from the bathroom So much perfume use had to open windows to stop hurting eyes

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: No cranes spoiling the view
Positive_Review: Extremely comfortable excellent posotion staff really helpful shame the wonderful view was marred by cranes but i guess thats a good sign of London

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Expensive they charge a lot on the wifi though it was bad and slow they charge a lot on kids movies Almost 10 pounds each movie no variety in breakfast take in consideration if you request something from the concierge he doesn t fulfill your needs Like booking having taxi ready in a certain time I had to wait for taxi to give me a ride to the airport although I requested that a night before I requested reservation for attractions the concierge promised to call me to confirm but he didn t So I had to start over again and wasted my time Though Robert Alfonso from the concierge were nice and helpful
Positive_Review: Water nozzle is available in the toilet for rinse after defecating Spacious rooms taxis are available at the property good location on Knightsbridge road where a lot of shops are open also harrods store in a waking distance and the hide park few meters away the security is excellent since no visitors can enter the property after a certain time 23 00 unless they have key cards

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: I didn t like the female staff in the reception they were very rood an I mention that to the manger
Positive_Review: I like the bed was very comfortable and the view was wonderful

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Insanely expensive room service corridor smaller of cigarette smoke Staff were clueless Was offer 2 hours free wifi in a three day stay We left early
Positive_Review: Great location and they have parking

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Even though I put a notice that I need an early check in I reached at 10 am to check in and the room was not avalible yet which fine since they told me that during my booking the staff promised me to get the room by 12 so I kept my bags with them and went to Harriods to spend time till the room gets ready I came back at 1 25 pm and still it was not ready and they told me they are cleaning the room this experience was a let down to me And they charge for in room wifi I used to get high speed internet while staying in a 4 start hotel in hongkong so I expect a high standard from a 5 start hotel in the middle of London
Positive_Review: Location Close to prime locations in London

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Instead of a room with park view at a higher floor I was given a room on the 2nd floor which was not a relaxing one as you can hear the road and building jobs next door Hotel was so nice before and now it definitely needs refurbishment Not a 5 standard anymore If the owners and management think that Russian and Arab guests have to pay for location and there is no need to keep the place to a certain level they are mistaken Not luxury anymore
Positive_Review: Very good breakfast friendly personnel comfortable bad

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: wifi was not free only two hours per day the breakfast and in room dining were good but they can be improved more varieties etc
Positive_Review: Lovely staff and very helpful Location is very good

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The value of money is too much Also the rooms are so small and tight Why you didn t include breakfast in the rooms since the price is high
Positive_Review: Your staff in reception were excellent

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: the resturant at the reception their staff verry rude I waited for them as it s my turn the waiter lady was chating to their freinds and i waited almost 45 minutes till she come back to me I told the manger about it and he didn t care he was the one without hair note that always every year i come and I receive the same bade service and there is allot of bad things at the hotel which needs a 50 000 word atleast to talk about I never ever recomend this hotel to anyone if you need your vacation to be perfect choose another 5 star hotel near by thank you

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Only drawback was noise from other rooms
Positive_Review: Everything was excellent such hotel facilities location room size staff support and friendliness etc

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Hotel stuff not being good to a frequent guest as well as a regular guest I guess they lack a proper hospitality as the hotel always run full occupancy Even as an SPG member I was treated like a normal guest I ve discussed this with them they answered me coz I booked through Booking Such an attitude yet this attitude is repeated again and again with every visit I make So this time I decided to leave a comment and I m going to send an email to SPG loyalty program about my history with This hotel I visit other SPG hotels I really was treated differently than normal guest Enough is enough the hotel should do more than what it s doing

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Non smoking room had clearly been smoked in and this was not noticed until too late with smelly bedding spoiling a night s sleep I d expect better policing of this sort of thing in a hotel of this level Wifi charges were ambiguous It should be free and clearly free for this price

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I was very impressed by the knowledge of the staff and their willingness to go the extra mile when explaining things directions etc We are a pretty average family and some staff in hotels have a look down attitude as if your not worthy to stay in their hotel Your staff couldn t have been more different thank you

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: I did request a high level room with amazing views as I have stayed there before but the room was low level with lots of road noise and a very very large mechanical crain outside our window
Positive_Review: easy to park quick to check in and breakfast was good

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: You have to pay for the Internet and it s the first time in my life I go to a five star hotel and they change me Every time I extend my check out to 14 00 for free and this time they charge me 30 pound

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The services in the hotel poor even my friends mentioned that to me When I check in the asked for a credit card with my name instead of the one I book with it and the receptionist was very rude even she says if u don t have one we can not accept u in the hotel when I told her why u did not mention that while I am doing the reservation

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Perfect location and room views the friendly staff and room equipped with everything I need Close to Harrods Harvey Nichols and sloane square it was my first visit but not the last

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The room is old and worn out moreover the bathroom was miserable I have requested from the receptionist to change the room or upgrade and i will afford to pay the difference but unfortunately the Hotel is full as the receptionist told me I could hear the person in the room beside snoring Had construction in the room above for 2 nights starting at 7 30 AM I have complained the first time and they told me it won t happen again and they asked if I would like to change the room for the last night I refused and requested to delay the construction till 9 30 AM and off course what I requested didn t happen I contacted the manager and the manager all she could do is provide me with 1 complementary breakfast for the last night Very terrible hotel and very terrible costumer service

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: I didnt like the treatment of the staff working in this hotel They predent that they Are 5 Star hotel but unfortunately the staff working dosent show that Comparing to other 5 star hotels this the worst i have ever stay on even 4 star hotels better than this hotel Before i visit we have tried to cancel our trip for but they refused We requested also to evacuate the fridge and they wanted to charge us 20 pounds and i have never heared all around the world any hotel charge for evacuating the fridge as they said a new policy Rude stuff

Hotel_Name: The Park Tower Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel
Negative_Review: The breakfast hate buffet sausages eggs
